ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) container herb and garlic flavored cream cheese, softened
1 bunch spinach - rinsed, stemmed, and dried

cookingTips: Blanch pea pods briefly to soften them for easier splitting
Finely chop spinach and squeeze dry to prevent excess moisture in filling
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you ensure the pea pods don't split when filling them?
